__e: Otherwise, take your conscience elsewhere... while we think about saving your ass.
Now you can either phone the president and explain to her that your conscience won't allow you to do what is necessary to save him, or you can simply do what is necessary.
Look, if you want to ease your guilty conscience, that's your business, but he's still the same son of a bitch he was when you all wanted me to put him down.
You've lost your mind, Rochefort. Leave now before it's too late!
But just so my conscience is clear, let me let you know why you're not coming with us, okay?
And I'm listening to my conscience.
